net.sf.oereader

Class OEMessageInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.oereader.OEBase
      • net.sf.oereader.OEIndexedInfo
        • net.sf.oereader.OEMessageInfo

  • public class OEMessageInfo
extends OEIndexedInfo
    Contains the information for a Message object. This object is only used in the MessageDB .dbx files. The pointers to the MessageInfo objects are stored in the Tree.
